tags.description: Get information about identity provider (IdP) access logs.
tags.name: IDP access logs

parameters.description: A unique identifier for each configuration.
parameters.name: configId

post.description: Lists the IDP access logs for a configuration for a given time period.

endTimeSec.description: The end time for report data, in epoch seconds.

value.title: Bad Request
value.detail: The system cannot understand your request.  Please check the syntax and correct any problems.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to the problem.

errors.description: A list of HTTP problem details. The error response includes this list if there are several problems with a single request, to call out each of them separately.

items.description: A nested problem response error object.

instance.description: The URI for this error occurrence.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

encryptedUserName.description: Filter report data by username, in plain text.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

eventName.description: Filter report data by event name. Provide the client name in plain text.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

fileType.description: Filter report data by file type.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

hasSinkholeCorrelation.description: Filter data based on whether the record has security connector-related records.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

httpRequestMethod.description: Filter report data by HTTP Request Method.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report. Either `PUT`, `POST`, `PATCH`, `OPTIONS`, `HEAD`, `GET`, `DELETE`, or `CONNECT`.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report. Either `PUT`, `POST`, `PATCH`, `OPTIONS`, `HEAD`, `GET`, `DELETE`, or `CONNECT`.

internalIP.description: Filter report data by internal IP reported by security connector.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

isAlert.description: Filter by whether an alert fired for the event.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

l7Protocol.description: Filter report data by Layer 7 protocol.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report. Either `DNS`, `HTTP`, or `HTTP(s)`.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report. Either `DNS`, `HTTP`, or `HTTP(s)`.

list.description: Filter report data by list IDs.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

onRamp.description: Filter data based on onramp status. Either `Yes` or `No`.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report. Either `Yes` or `No`.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report. Either `Yes` or `No`.

onRampType.description: Filter data based on onramp type.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report. Refer to [Onramp types](ref:onramp-types) for a complete list.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report. Refer to [Onramp types](ref:onramp-types) for a complete list.

policy.description: Filter report data by policy IDs.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

proxyDestinationPort.description: Filter report data by destination port numbers.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

reason.description: Filter report data by reason text.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

severityId.description: Filter report data by severity level. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report. Refer to [Severity levels](https://techdocs.akamai.com/etp/docs/indicator-search#severity-levels) for more details.

sinkholeIP.description: Filter report data by sinkhole IP address.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

site.description: Filter report data by site IDs.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

sourcePort.description: Filter report data by source port of traffic.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

sublocationId.description: Filter report data by sublocation ID.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

threatId.description: Filter report data by threat ID.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

transportType.description: Filter report data by transport type.

in.description: Strings containing filter parameters to include in the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

nin.description: Strings containing filter parameters to exclude from the report.

startTimeSec.description: The start time for report data, in epoch seconds.

upToCount.description: The number of records expected in the report.

http-problem-nested.description: A nested problem response error object.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to the problem.

errors.description: A list of HTTP problem details. The error response includes this list if there are several problems with a single request, to call out each of them separately.

items.description: A nested problem response error object.

instance.description: The URI for this error occurrence.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

value.title: Bad Request
